description: Sum along upward diagonal of Pascal triangle from (but not including) center.
maple: A010756 := proc(d)    local a,n,m;    a := 0 ;    for n from 0 to d do        m := d-n ;        if m >= 1+floor(d/3) then            a := a+binomial(n,m) ;        end if;    end do:    a ;end proc: # _R. J. Mathar_, Feb 08 2016
author: _R. K. Guy_
